activities: DISA, Inc. (“DISA”) gathers personal data for the purpose of supporting its clients’ (employers’) employment practices, e.g. employee hiring, promoting, and discharging. Initially, personal consumer/employee data is received from the client and is used, in turn, to gather the information required by clients to facilitate their requirements for employment. The link to the Safe Harbor Data Protection Policy can be found on the right navigation bar at http://www.disa.com/index.php/services/employee-screening/background-screening.html.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
